properties.name: pumpkin.log.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable Pumpkin Log SDK.

properties.name: pumpkin.log.console.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable console log output.

properties.name: pumpkin.log.file.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable file log output.

properties.name: pumpkin.log.file.path
properties.description: File path for log output. Use {pid} placeholder for process ID.

properties.name: pumpkin.log.file.async.enabled
properties.description: Enable async file appender instead of sync file appender.

properties.name: pumpkin.log.file.async.buffer-size
properties.description: Queue buffer size for async file appender.

properties.name: pumpkin.log.file.async.batch-size
properties.description: Batch size for async file appender writes.

properties.name: pumpkin.log.exclude-paths
properties.description: List of path patterns to exclude from logging. Supports Ant-style patterns.
